property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: URL
property.shortdesc: The value of the Adobe URL tag assigned to this artwork item.

property.name: note
property.shortdesc: The note assigned to this artwork item.

property.name: layer
property.shortdesc: The layer to which this artwork belongs.

property.name: locked
property.shortdesc: Is this artwork item locked?

property.name: hidden
property.shortdesc: Is this artwork item hidden?

property.name: selected
property.shortdesc: Is this artwork item selected?

property.name: position
property.shortdesc: The position of the top left corner of the art item.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width of the art item.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height of the art item.

property.name: geometricBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the artwork excluding stroke width.

property.name: visibleBounds
property.shortdesc: The visible bounds of the artwork including stroke width.

property.name: controlBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the artwork including stroke width and controls.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The item's name.

property.name: blendingMode
property.shortdesc: The mode used when compositing an object.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The object's opacity (between 0.0 and 100.0)

property.name: isIsolated
property.shortdesc: Is the artwork isolated.

property.name: artworkKnockout
property.shortdesc: Is the artwork used to create a knockout.

property.name: zOrderPosition
property.shortdesc: The drawing order of the art within it's group or layer.

property.name: editable
property.shortdesc: Can the art item be modified.

property.name: sliced
property.shortdesc: Is the art item sliced (default: false)

property.name: top
property.shortdesc: The top position of the art item.

property.name: left
property.shortdesc: The left position of the art item.

property.name: visibilityVariable
property.shortdesc: The visibility variable bound to this page item.

property.name: tags
property.shortdesc: The collection of tags associated with this page item.

property.name: pixelAligned
property.shortdesc: Is this artwork item aligned to Pixel Grid?

property.name: wrapped
property.shortdesc: Wrap text frame objects around this object (text frame must be above the object)

property.name: wrapOffset
property.shortdesc: Use this offset when wrapping text around this object.

property.name: wrapInside
property.shortdesc: Should the text frame object be wrapped inside this object?

parameters.name: deltaX
parameters.shortdesc: Horizontal transformation.

parameters.name: deltaY
parameters.shortdesc: Vertical transformation.

parameters.name: transformObjects
parameters.shortdesc: Are art object positions and orientations affected?

parameters.name: transformFillPatterns
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: transformFillGradients
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill gradients assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: transformStrokePattern
parameters.shortdesc: Are the stroke patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: scaleX
parameters.shortdesc: Horizontal scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)

parameters.name: scaleY
parameters.shortdesc: Vertical scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)

parameters.name: changePositions
parameters.shortdesc: Are art object positions and orientations effected?

parameters.name: changeFillPatterns
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeFillGradients
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill gradients assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeStrokePattern
parameters.shortdesc: Are the stroke patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeLineWidths
parameters.shortdesc: The amount line widths are to be scaled (expressed as a percentage)

parameters.name: scaleAbout
parameters.shortdesc: The point on the art item's bounding box to which the scale is applied.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.shortdesc: Angle of rotation (in degrees). Rotation is performed counter-clock wise.

parameters.name: changePositions
parameters.shortdesc: Are art object positions and orientations effected?

parameters.name: changeFillPatterns
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeFillGradients
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill gradients assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeStrokePattern
parameters.shortdesc: Are the stroke patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: rotateAbout
parameters.shortdesc: The point on the art item's bounding box to which the rotation is applied.

method.name: transform
method.shortdesc: Transform art object(s) using a transformation matrix.

parameters.name: transformationMatrix
parameters.shortdesc: The transformation matrix to be applied to the objects.

parameters.name: changePositions
parameters.shortdesc: Are art object positions and orientations effected?

parameters.name: changeFillPatterns
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeFillGradients
parameters.shortdesc: Are the fill gradients assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeStrokePattern
parameters.shortdesc: Are the stroke patterns assigned to paths to be transformed?

parameters.name: changeLineWidths
parameters.shortdesc: The amount line widths are to be scaled (expressed as a percentage)

parameters.name: transformAbout
parameters.shortdesc: The point on the art item's bounding box to which scale and rotation operations apply.

method.name: bringInPerspective
method.shortdesc: Place art object(s)in perspective grid at spedified perspective plane and coordinate.

parameters.name: positionX
parameters.shortdesc: Position towards X direction of specified or active perspective grid plane.

parameters.name: positionY
parameters.shortdesc: Position towards Y direction of specified or active perspective grid plane.

parameters.name: perspectiveGridPlane
parameters.shortdesc: Type of perspective grid plane.

method.name: zOrder
method.shortdesc: Arranges the art relative to other art in the group or layer.

parameters.name: zOrderCmd
parameters.shortdesc: How to arrange the art.

method.name: sendScriptMessage
method.shortdesc: Sends the script message to the required plugin.

parameters.name: pluginName
parameters.shortdesc: Plugin to which message needs to be sent.

parameters.name: messageSelector
parameters.shortdesc: Functionality that is to be executed.

parameters.name: inputString
parameters.shortdesc: Pass any data encoded in a string.
